exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="EndRankItemSkin" width="180" height="270" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"  states="selet,unSelect" >
	<w:Config id="160d9991c56" ></w:Config>
	<e:Rect width="180" height="270" includeIn="unSelect" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" fillColor="0xffffff" ellipseWidth="30" ellipseHeight="30"/>
	<e:Image id="bg" source="rankchose_png" top="0" right="0" left="0" bottom="0" scale9Grid="22,33,136,204" anchorOffsetY="0" includeIn="selet"/>
	<e:Label id="rank" text="30" y="19" size="30" fontFamily="SimHei" italic="true" bold="true" textAlign="center" anchorOffsetX="0" width="193" textColor="0xcc3830" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label id="nameText" text="srwe巨盾footMan21212" y="170" size="20" fontFamily="SimHei" bold="true" anchorOffsetX="0" width="195" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" multiline="false" textColor="0xcc3830" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="userPic" width="80" height="80" y="65" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="score" width="383" height="62" y="212" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" text="40" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5" letterSpacing="3" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="0" font.unSelect="zitiF_fnt" font="zitiF_fnt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="gameEndSkin" width="662" height="850" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="1607c5a4d5e"/>
	<e:Group x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetY="0" height="850">
		<e:Image id="restartBtn" source="againBtn_png" y="719.4" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image source="rankbody_png" x="2" y="73"/>
		<e:Label text="排行榜" x="72" y="299.7" size="24" fontFamily="SimHei" textColor="0x8f0903"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="myscore" width="245.33" height="64.04" y="174.25" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" text="0" font="ziti_fnt" rotation="359.52" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" textAlign="center" letterSpacing="6" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label id="topScore" text="历史最高分：0" size="30" fontFamily="SimHei" y="551.93" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Group id="subGroup" width="541.52" height="278.67" y="340.16" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="-4">
			<e:Label id="notIngameText" text="只有在App中玩，才能获得排名和奖励哦，快去下载App吧！" y="33.09" size="36" fontFamily="SimHei" anchorOffsetY="0" height="172" anchorOffsetX="0" width="510" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" textColor="0xcc3830" horizontalCenter="-1.4250000000000114"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Label id="allRank" text="查看全部排行>" x="438" y="301.64" size="24" fontFamily="SimHei" textColor="0x8f0903"/>
		<e:Image id="closeBtn" source="closeBtn_png" x="555" y="0"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.button.NewGame" states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="220" height="70">
    <e:Rect includeIn="down" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor="0xA38468" ellipseWidth="18" ellipseHeight="18"/>
    <e:Rect includeIn="disabled" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor="0xcccccc" ellipseWidth="18" ellipseHeight="18"/>
    <e:Rect includeIn="up" left="0" right="1" top="0" bottom="-2" ellipseWidth="18" ellipseHeight="18" fillColor="0xa52f0b" anchorOffsetX="0"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="12" bottom="12" left="12" right="12"
             size="24"
             textColor="0xffffff" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" text="Button" size.disabled="36" size.up="36" size.down="36" bold.disabled="true" bold.down="true" bold.up="true" fontFamily.up="SimHei"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameInfoSkin" width="660" height="694" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="160a162cf95"/>
	<e:Group width="660" height="694" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Image source="infoBg_png" x="0" y="0"/>
		<e:Scroller width="464.67" height="357.42" x="101.03" y="159.33" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
			<e:Group width="486.67" height="435.42" x="97" y="130" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0">
				<e:Label id="desc" text="点击屏幕，红色的点击屏幕，点击屏幕，点击屏幕，点击屏幕，点击屏幕，点击屏幕，点击屏幕，点击屏幕，时钟会发射子弹射击其他时钟，被击中的时钟会代替红色时钟，并会增加分数，注意红色时钟的方向哦！" size="30" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" bold="true" fontFamily="SimHei" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="top" lineSpacing="20" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" top="0" bottom="-257.58" y="246" right="0.6700000000000159" left="4" width="500" height="600" textColor="0xcc3830"/>
				<e:layout>
					<e:BasicLayout/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>

			<e:Skin>
			<e:Image id="thumb" width="8" source=""/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:Scroller>
		<e:Button id="goBackBtn" label="返回游戏" x="220" y="564.09" skinName="skins.button.NewGame"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:BasicLayout/>
		</e:layout>
		
		
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameStartSkinSkin" minWidth="360" minHeight="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<e:Group id="mainGroup" left="0" right="0" bottom="0" top="0" width="720" height="1280">
		<e:Image id="rewardBtn" source="awardBtn_png" x="235" y="816"/>
		<e:Image id="infoBtn" source="infoBtn_png" x="235" y="666.33"/>
		<e:Image id="rankBtn" source="rankBtn_png" x="235" y="516.67"/>
		<e:Image id="startBtn" source="startGame_png" y="367" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="RankListItemSkin" width="600" height="120" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"  states="nomorl,order" >
	<w:Config id="160a06e27c6" ></w:Config>
	<e:Rect width="600" height="120" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" fillAlpha="1" fillColor="0xffffff" strokeWeight="0.5" strokeColor="0x444444" strokeAlpha="1"/>
	<e:Rect width="86" height="86" x="119" y="18" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" ellipseWidth="0" ellipseHeight="0" fillColor="0x000000"/>
	<e:Label id="order" x="48.3" y="49" size="24" fontFamily="SimHei" bold="true" textAlign="left" text="250" anchorOffsetX="0" width="52" textColor="0x333333" includeIn="nomorl"/>
	<e:Label x="235.04" y="46" size="30" fontFamily="SimHei" text="{data.userName}" textColor="0x333333" textAlign="left"/>
	<e:Label id="scoreTxt" x="400.12" y="40" size="30" fontFamily="SimHei" textAlign="right" anchorOffsetX="0" width="177.57" text="{data.userScore}" anchorOffsetY="0" height="42.12" textColor="0xff0000"/>
	<e:Image id="userPic" width="86" height="86" x="119" y="18"/>
	<e:Image id="orderPic" width="41.21" height="76.67" includeIn="order" x="44.3" y="23" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="order3_png" fillMode="clip"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="tabBtnSkin" states="up,down" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" height.up="50" width="200" height="50" width.up="200">
	<e:Image source="unselect_png" includeIn="down" x="0" y="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image source="select_png" includeIn="up" x="-5" y="0" visible="true"/>
	<e:Label text="本地排名" includeIn="down" x="60" y="10" anchorOffsetX="0" width="133.33" textColor="0xffffff"/>
	<e:Image width="42" height="42" x="12" y="4" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" includeIn="down" source="localRank_png"/>
	<e:Image width="42" height="42" x="12" y="4" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" includeIn="up" source="local_2_png"/>
	<e:Label text="本地排名" x="60" y="10" anchorOffsetX="0" width="124" fontFamily="SimHei" includeIn="up" textColor="0xa4231d"/>
	
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="tabBtn2Skin" states="up,down" width="400" height="300" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"  width.down="200" height.down="50" width.up="200" height.up="50">
	<w:Config id="161081e6cc5" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image source="unselect_png" includeIn="down" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image source="select_png" includeIn="up" x="-5" y="0" visible="true"/>
	<e:Image width="42" height="42" x="12" y="4" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" includeIn="down" source="nation_2_png"/>
	<e:Label text="全国排名" includeIn="down" x="60" y="10" anchorOffsetX="0" width="127.52" fontFamily="SimHei" anchorOffsetY="0" height="26.97" textColor="0xffffff"/>
	<e:Image width="42" height="42" x="12" y="4" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" includeIn="up" rotation="360" source="nationRnak_png"/>
	<e:Label text="全国排名" x="60" y="10" anchorOffsetX="0" width="127.52" fontFamily="SimHei" includeIn="up" anchorOffsetY="0" height="28.48" textColor="0xa4231d"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="RankPanelSkin" width="660" height="1110" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*" >
	<w:Config id="160a035ebee" ></w:Config>
	<e:Group width="660" height="1110" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Image id="backBtn" source="closeBtn_png" right="24" verticalCenter="-515.225"/>
		<e:Image width="665.45" source="rankbg_png" scale9Grid="82,119,496,717" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" height="1033.79" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" top="81" horizontalCenter="2.5"/>
		<e:Button id="localBtn" label="Button" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" height="51.27" skinName="tabBtnSkin" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" top="113" left="110" width="200"/>
		<e:Button id="nationBtn" label="Button" anchorOffsetX="0" width="194.66" anchorOffsetY="0" height="51.27" skinName="tabBtn2Skin" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" right="71" top="113"/>
		<e:Scroller id="scroller" width="600" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" top="196" left="29" right="29" bottom="32.450000000000045" x="29.000000000000007" y="93.33000000000001" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:Skin>
			<e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" width="8" minHeight="100%" height="100%" right="0">
				<e:Skin>
				<e:Image id="thumb" width="0" source=""/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:VScrollBar>
			</e:Skin>
			<e:List id="mylist" height="764.17" y="-145.45" x="0" anchorOffsetX="0" width="602.67" anchorOffsetY="0" locked="true"/>
		</e:Scroller>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="RewardsSkinSkin" width="542" height="810" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"  >
	<w:Config id="161021bf1f7"/>
	<e:Group width="540" height="807" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Image id="okBtn" source="closeBtn2_png" right="38" top="5"/>
		<e:Image source="beijing_png" horizontalCenter="0" top="58"/>
		<e:Scroller width="484" height="582.85" y="172.99" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" rotation="0.01" x="30.01">
			<e:Group width="484" height="610.12" x="0" y="-34" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0">
				<e:Label id="desc" text="    周榜第一名，可获得价值五百元的新年大礼包一份，奖品由浏阳广播电视台提供。				周榜第二名，可获得价值三百元的新年礼包一份，奖品由千城智联（上海）网络科技有限公司提供。 周榜第三名，可获得价值一百元的新年奖券一份，奖品由浏阳食品公司提供。				通关用户将有机会获得最高一千元现金红包奖励。				周榜奖励会在每周日的20:00进行统计，获奖用户可凭借帐号排名，前往浏阳广播电视台进行兑换。				本活动排名以“掌上浏阳”客户端排位为准。				本次活动最终解释权归浏阳广播电视台所有。" size="30" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" fontFamily="SimHei" textAlign="left" lineSpacing="20" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" top="-2" y="246"  multiline="true" x="0" textColor="0x333333" width="484"/>
				<e:layout verticalAlign="middle">
					<e:BasicLayout/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>

			<e:Skin>
			<e:Image id="thumb" width="8" source=""/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:Scroller>
		<e:Image id="title" source="titleAward_png" fillMode="clip" x="178" top="72"/>
		<e:Button id="gameBtn" label="立即试玩" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="0" width="191.18" anchorOffsetY="0" height="57.64" skinName="skins.button.NewGame" horizontalCenter="-126.5" verticalCenter="313.5"/>
		<e:Button id="linkBtn" label="立即下载" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="0" width="191.18" anchorOffsetY="0" height="-306.36" skinName="skins.button.NewGame" horizontalCenter="127.5" verticalCenter="313.5"/>
		
		
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="UninAppNoticSkin" width="660" height="694" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" >
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="btnMv">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{linkBtn}">
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object width="{255.18}" height="{130}" y="{515}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<w:Config id="16101ffe6d3"/>
	<e:Group width="660" height="694" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Image source="tipsBg_png" x="0" y="0"/>
		<e:Scroller width="500.67" height="408.94" x="80" y="151.81" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
			<e:Group width="560.67" height="472.94" x="-60" y="0" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0">
				<e:Label id="desc" text="非官方APP目前仅支持游戏体验，所得分数不计入排行。 下载并登录官方APP参加趣味游戏，可参与好友排行，还有丰厚奖励等你拿哦！" size="30" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" bold="true" fontFamily="SimHei" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" lineSpacing="20" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" top="8" bottom="9.939999999999998" y="246" right="20.670000000000016" left="28" width="500" height="600" textColor="0xcc3830"/>
				<e:layout>
					<e:BasicLayout/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>

			<e:Skin>
			<e:Image id="thumb" width="8" source=""/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:Scroller>
		<e:Button id="gameBtn" label="立即试玩" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="0" width="191.18" anchorOffsetY="0" height="57.64" skinName="skins.button.NewGame" horizontalCenter="-144.5" verticalCenter="243">
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="linkBtn" label="立即下载" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="0" width="191.18" anchorOffsetY="0" height="-306.36" skinName="skins.button.NewGame" horizontalCenter="136.5" verticalCenter="243">
		</e:Button>
		
		
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="bloodProcessSkin" width="92" height="24" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="1611c9c8d4b" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image source="bloodBarBg_png" x="0" scale9Grid="15,8,56,7" width="100%" height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" source="bloodBar_png" x="0" y="0" scale9Grid="19,9,51,5" width="100%" height="100%"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" text="1/2" size="16" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="SimHei" verticalCenter="1"/>

	
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="startButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="btnStart" includeIn="disabled" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="1"/>
</e:Skin>
